description: A PHP framework for web artisans

SecLists is the security tester's companion. It's a collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place. List types include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, and many more.

Sends your logs to files, sockets, inboxes, databases and various web services
Generate entity relation diagrams from your Laravel model files.
A pure PHP library for reading and writing spreadsheet files
Build a full-featured administrative interface in ten minutes
String manipulation, leveled up!
PHP Static Analysis Tool - discover bugs in your code without running it!
The PHP Unit Testing framework.
Larastan - Discover bugs in your code without running it. A Phpstan wrapper for Laravel.
Guzzle, an extensible PHP HTTP client
A PHP parser written in PHP
Nextcloud server, a safe home for all your data
The Symfony PHP framework

This component provides a partial, native PHP implementation for the Ctype extension.
A PHP library for generating RFC 4122 version 1, 3, 4, and 5 universally unique identifiers (UUID).
The Console component eases the creation of beautiful and testable command line interfaces.
The classic email sending library for PHP
This is a collection of tutorials for learning how to use Docker with various tools. Contributions welcome.
